section.title: Bill
section.para: This function allows you to list the last nine bills that are related to loans availed by your company.

section.title: Bill Options
section.para: The menu for this module has the following groups of functions.

section.title: Bills
section.para: Use this function to review Bills from the Back-Office.

section.title: Bills List
section.para: You can retrieve a list of borrower's bills by entering the search criteria and clicking the Search button. You can select from Borrower Reference and view details in the columns: Bill ID, Billing Date, Due Date, Ccy and Due Amount.

note.para: The bills can be viewed in PDF and Text formats for Loan IQ 7.3. However, for Loan IQ 7.1, it can be viewed only in Text format.
